DOC.brief_summary: This observational study evaluate prevalence functional perineum disorder ( stress urinary incontinence , overactive bladder syndrome , dysuria , anal incontinence ) CF adults patient North-West CF Network . Its aims measure severity urinary anorectal symptom ; assess impact patient ' quality life , sexuality , care social life relationship ; identify medical demographic factor associate severity urinary anorectal disorder impact determine relationship severity disorder , various repercussion , risk factor .
